scripts.test: set EXCLUDE_TAGS=baml,flaky,failing&& npx tsx --test --test-concurrency=1 --test-reporter tap %npm_config_test% > test.log 2>&1
scripts.test-smoke: set TAGS=smoke&& npx tsx --test --test-concurrency=1 --test-reporter tap %npm_config_test% > test.log 2>&1
scripts.test-smoke-ci: set TAGS=smoke&& npx tsx --test --test-concurrency=1 --test-reporter tap test*.ts
scripts.test-flaky: set TAGS=flaky&& npx tsx --test --test-concurrency=1 --test-reporter tap %npm_config_test% > test.log 2>&1
scripts.test-failing: set TAGS=failing&& npx tsx --test --test-concurrency=1 --test-reporter tap %npm_config_test% > test.log 2>&1
scripts.test-baml: set TAGS=baml&& npx tsx --test --test-concurrency=1 --test-reporter tap %npm_config_test% > test.log 2>&1
